what: Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
title: Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
text: RStudio projects colleagues different structure? difficult navigate understand others’ projects? even project months/years ago? Therefore, useful agree standard folder structure analysis. Templates can help enforce . Currently, package provides one standard data analysis template RStudio projects geared towards scientific use cases. Whenever start new project RStudio, package provides standard folder structure directly code editor. Also, can help improving reproducibility using git renv.

title: Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
text: create new project folder structure shown , follow steps: Install package Restart RStudio creating new RStudio project “New directory” option, choose “Standard analysis template” initialization can select folder called 06_Analysis_for_publication included (check “Include Analysis publication folder”) can select want generate .gitignore file (check “Create .gitignore file”) can select want use renv (check “Use renv project”) ’ve created project, provided instructions create git repository project connect github/gitlab

title: Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
text: new project contains following folder structure:
code: |-- Data |   |-- 01_Raw |   `-- 02_Clean |   R |   |-- src |   |   |-- fun_load_data.R |   |   |-- fun_helpers.R |   |   |-- fun_transform_data.R |-- Analysis |   |-- analysis.Rmd |   |-- analysis.qmd |-- Documentation |   |-- 01_Text |   `-- 02_Final_figures |-- Outputs |   |-- 01_Results               |   |-- 02_Figures               |   `-- 03_Tables     |-- Misc |   |-- Public               |   |-- Priv |-- README.md |-- .gitignore                   |-- renv

text: can easily create template. Fork repo create new pair <my_template>.R <my_template>.dcf files. <my_template>.dcf defines template named options shown select template project wizard. <my_template>.R defines happens template used. look standard_analysis.R standard_analysis.dcf inspiration check RStudio Extensions documentation.
